entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: single_query #60681
  • How to map static assets with nuget #60680
  • MAUI with "dotnet watch" hot reloading does not work for CSS changes #60679

Closed

  • Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server 9.0.2 executes startup code on BUILD #60663
  • Error building the repository locally due to xcopy-msbuild version #60665
  • [dotnet-sdk-10.0.100-preview.2.25125.6] IAuthenticationService.ImplementationType returns Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationServiceImpl instead #60645
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json, json_middleware #60603
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json_middleware #60660
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #60604
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json #60668
  • Perf regression: fortunes, single_query #60669

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e235eb3` to `24a9e94` #60678
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e235eb3` to `24a9e94` #60677
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [Templates][Identity] Update jquery-validation to 1.20.0 #60675
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Update xcopy-msbuild to latest available version #60666
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • InputNumber formatting for decimal numbers #60112
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Use ImpersonationToken for IIS Windows Auth #58041
    feature-iis, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF core logs `OperationCanceledException` if `CancellationToken` is cancelled before query starts #35708
  • Query/Test: add relationship test model which only contains references (no collections) #35707

Closed

  • HasDefaultValue in owned entity boolean property affecting updates #35700
  • Converter should take into account subtyping #35703
  • Make All properties of a type required #35668

PullRequests

Updated

  • Support translating some string functions when they have a char parameters #34999
    community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Picker Focused/Unfocused Events Do Not Fire on Android #28121
  • Explicit Style in ContentPage Crashes on Android in Release Build Only #28120
  • [iOS] CollectionView2 - empty view issues #28118
  • [Android] UI labels are cut off when embedded in a layout (twice or more?) at specific DPI and screen resolution values. #28117

Closed

  • Unloaded and Loaded events get called multiple times #20595
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Picker - focus/unfocus events #28122
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] CollectionView2 - empty view - improvements #28119
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2
  • Fix NullReferenceException in PaintExtensions.IsSolid on Android #28116
    community ✨

Updated

  • [Android] DatePicker Focus and Unfocus events #20547
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [Essentials] Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled #27941
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-essentials, community ✨, essentials-geolocation, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • Improve PropertyMapper performance #28077
    community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] CollectionView Does Not Scroll When EmptyView Exceeds Screen Size - fix #28094
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28093
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regression in dotnet publish using .NET 9 SDK 9.0.200 #77388
  • Syntax highlight is missing for 'using unsafe' type aliases #77387
  • Calling t?.GetHashCode() in generic method emits longer code than needed #77386

Closed

  • IDE0040 description can be misleading #77384

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix unexpected exceptions #77385
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Updated

  • Improve performance of SyntaxReplacer.ReplaceNode #77314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77374
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP: First attempt at cleaning up package load to do less thread switching during InitializeAsync #77368
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Extensions: Resolve classic and new extension methods together #77343
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Adds lightbulb option to offer implementing `NotImplementedException` #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Bump BCL references to 9.0 #76890
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expand API surface for DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, TimeOnly, and TimeSpan #113033
    Future
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: NotImplementedException: We currently don't handle function pointer types. #113031
  • QuicConnection.ConnectAsync() connection failure causes memory leak. #113030

Closed

  • net9.0 app crash when run #113029
  • Requires Dynamic Code on a default constructor not respected when inherited. #112931
  • Question: Is .NET behavior proper in the presence of the `\\?\` prefix? What does "\\?\." exactly mean? #39300
  • `Directory.EnumerateFiles` does not respect per-directory case-sensitivity setting #39370
  • Can the GetProcessesByName method reduce the number of arrays and Process objects created? #40768

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove some bounds checks around Vector.Create(Span) #113035
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Support Telemetry Schema Url in tracing and metrics #113034
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 10.0.0
  • Use minipal_getcpufeatures to detect for AVX #113032
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: more inlining with EH prep work #113023
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Generate calls to interface methods through resolve helper #112406
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize bit operations of BigInteger #113005
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono] Implement `AssemblyExtensions.TryGetRawMetadata`. #111642
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Add benchmarks.run_pgo_optrepeat collection #112750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SSA-based ComputeRange in assertprop #112824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: enable inlining methods with EH #112998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove a few unsafe bits in BCL #111643
    area-Meta, reduce-unsafe
  • Avoid `Unsafe.As` in `BitConverter` #112616
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, reduce-unsafe
  • Add test for external assembly probe mechanism #113007
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [9.0] Make counting of IO completion work items more precise on Windows #112794
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading, 9.0.x
  • Separate code manager for the interpreter #112985
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Use collection expressions in array.cs #113028
    needs-area-label
  • Implement software write watch for GC heap feature for arm32. #113017
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cached interface dispatch for coreclr #111771
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Experimental PR #111004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [9.0] Make CPU utilization checks in the thread pool configurable #112791
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 9.0.4

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug/Linux] dotnet CLI recursively compiling projects #47209

Closed

  • Improve command-line help for `dotnet workload search version` #43361
  • Investigate failures in WorkloadTests when using net10.0 workload manifests #45516

PullRequests

Created

Updated

  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611

  • Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #42861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898

    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

    documentation, Area-run-file
